recharge.tip.warning.text: Tip: Change your bank account on the platform at any time. Go to the Recharge page to get the latest account every time you recharge. If you recharge the expired account, we are not responsible for it
get.tip.content1.text: Note: When the user matches the order, the platform will send the order information to the merchant at the same time.
get.tip.content2.text: If the user does not pay within 60 minutes, the order will be blocked bypassing the online shopping platform.
get.tip.content3.text: When an order is frozen, so is the money in the order.

withdraw.tip.con1.text: 1. Please fill in your bank account information accurately. We will not be responsible for any loss of funds caused by your incorrect information.
withdraw.tip.con2.text: 2. The arrival time shall be 24 hours before the next day, and the specific arrival time shall be subject to the bank.
order.single.detail.tip.text: Waiting for buyer confirmation, your order will be frozen Waiting for buyer confirmation, your order will be frozen before
bank.card.bind.tip.desc.text: Please confirm that your account number is correct. We are not responsible for any input errors.
bank.card.bind.tip.bottom.desc.text: If you need to modify the account information, please contact the online customer service.

invite.friend.desc1.text: Invite friends to make money with you
invite.friend.desc2.text: You can work part-time through your mobile phone
job.desc.content.p1.text: Merchants buy from merchants. After the purchase is completed, the merchant will refund your payment and commission. For example, if you buy 100 yuan of goods, the merchant will refund 180 yuan.
job.desc.content.p2.text: This way, you earn a commission for the task, the merchant's product will be better known, rank will be higher, and sales will be higher. Businesses will be happy to give you a commission as long as you get the job done.
job.desc.content.p3.text: Of course, when you complete the purchase, you must have money in your account to pay, so you must top up before completing the purchase. Make sure the funds you recharge are in your account and protected by law. Yes, you can withdraw at any time.
job.desc.content.p4.text: The higher the price, the higher the commission. The more money you make, the more I'm sure you'll enjoy the job. God bless you!
about.us.content.p1.text: Welcome to Mercado Libre Mission Mall, our company was founded in Sao Paulo in 2007 with a large staff and a good working environment. Now Hi-Tech is looking for part-time employees who can work from home using mobile phones. Hourly workstations and locations are free for one hour per day. Earn from 3,000 to 10,000. The main goal of our work is to help businesses online to buy their products, increase the popularity of their products and sales, and businesses through this process we commission reward, businesses can make more money by selling more products, you can also earn your commission, this is a double income, you will earn more real, and improve the quality of your life, Join us now
about.us.content.p2.text: Copyright © 1999-2022 Ebazar.com.br LTDA. All rights Reserved.
about.us.content.p4.text: nº 3.003, Bonfim, Osasco/ SP-CEP 06233-903-Mercado Livre Group Co.
agent.desc.content.p2.text: To apply as an agent, please contact customer service
company.desc.content.p1.text: Mercadolivre, eBay's former partner in Latin America, is by far the largest electronic trading platform in South America, allowing buyers and sellers to exchange business information (like Taobao), It operates in 13 countries and territories (Brazil, Argentina), Chile, Colombia, Costa Rica, Ecuador, Mexico, Panama, Peru, Dominica, Paraguay, Venezuela and Portugal). On March 11, 2010, MercadoLibre had a total of 50.2 million registered users. According to comscore Networks, Mercadolivre ranks among the top 50 in the world for traffic volume.
company.desc.content.p2.text: In 2009, Mercadolivre sales totaled 29.5 million units, with a total value of $2.75 billion. In the third quarter of 2010, the number of new products reached 10.4 million units, a growth rate of 30.1%.
company.desc.content.p3.text: In addition to Mercadolivre, they also have an Alipay-like platform called MercadoPago, which launched in 2003 and is one of the largest e-payment platforms in South America. Your business involves South America. Seven countries and territories: Brazil, Argentina, Chile, Colombia, Mexico, Venezuela. Through the second quarter of 2009, 700,000 payments were made through MercadoPago, bringing the 2009 total to $382.6 million.
company.desc.content.p4.text: Marcos GalPerin (founder and current CEO of Mercadolivre) wrote the business plan for Mercadolivre in 1999 while studying for his MBA at Stanford Graduate School of Business and recruited a team to create Mercadolivre. Mercadolivre was officially launched in Argentina in 1999, entered the Brazilian market in the same year, and expanded to other countries in the following years.
company.desc.content.p5.text: In addition to the initial funding, Mercadolivre has obtained two rounds of financing:
company.desc.content.p6.text: First funding: In November 1999, JP Morgan, BHCA LP, Flatiron, Hicks, Muse, Tate&Furst invested a total of $7.6 million. Second funding: In May 2000, Goldman Sachs, Capital RiesgoInternetSCR (a subsidiary of Banco Santander), GE Capital, JP Morgan, BHCA LP, Flatiron, Hicks, Muse, Tate & Furst invested a total of $46.7 million.
company.desc.content.p7.text: In August 2007, Mercadolivre was listed on Nasdaq under the symbol MELI
